message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which holds significant value for us at $12,000. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. I propose to sell this product to you for $11,500. This price reflects a strategic balance between maximizing my earnings and ensuring you receive a valuable asset at a reasonable cost. I believe this opportunity would be mutually beneficial, providing you with exceptional value while allowing me to secure a profit. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.
